Description: Black basalt slab; relief representation of Nakhtnebef kneeling on obverse.
Curator's comments: Often erroneously referred to as "intercolumnar" PM IV: p. 5 (wrongly as BM '22'; see also under that number) Published: Mysliwiec, Royal Portraiture of the Dynasties XXI-XXX (1988): 69
To be included in the 'Musee achemenide virtuel et interactif' (see www.achemenet.com).
Exhibition history: 2016 8 Mar-12 Jun, Cleveland, Cleveland Museum of Art, Pharoah: King of Egypt 2018 7 Jun-16 Sep, Barcelona, La Caixa, Pharaoh: King of Egypt 2018-2019 16 Oct-20 jan, Madrid, La Caixa, Pharaoh: King of Egypt
Acquisition notes: Collected by A.C. Harris. Catalogue of collection (AES archive) states this objects was "found at Alexandria?"
